body.message1: Do you want to delete the address book selected? If you delete it, all the related content will be moved to trash and the address book will no longer be visible.
body.message2: Do you want to delete permanently the address book selected? If you delete it, all the related content will be permanently removed and the address book will no longer be recoverable.

body.message1: Do you want to empty the address book selected?
body.message2: If you empty it, all the related content will be moved to trash.

body.message1: Select an address book to move the considered one to:
body.message3: Select a folder to move the considered one to:

body.message2: Select an address book which will contain the newly created one:

input.name: Insert address book name
input.name_exist: Name already exists in this path

label.error_try_again: Something went wrong, please try again
label.revoke_with_standard_msg: Revoke access sending a standard notification
label.revoke_without_notification: Revoke access without sending a notification
label.revoke_with_custom_msg: Revoke access sending a custom notification

message.new_contact: This contact will be created in the 'Contacts' folder
message.search_hints: Search hints we need to discuss about

delete.if_delete_lost_forever: By permanently deleting this contact you will not be able to recover it anymore, continue?
delete.sure_delete_contact: Are you sure to delete this contact permanently?
delete.sure_delete_contact_plural: Are you sure to delete the selected contacts permanently?

snackbar.address_book_moved: Address book moved to destination folder
snackbar.contact_moved: Contact moved to destination address book
snackbar.contact_restored: Contact restored in destination address book

checkbox.autocomplete_on_comma: Select autocomplete match when a comma is typed
checkbox.incl_addrs_in_glbl_addrs_list: Include addresses in the Global Address List
checkbox.srch_glbl_addrs_list: Initially search the Global Address List when using the contact picker

share.find_shares_label: Select which address book you want to see in contact’s tree
share.share_note: The standard message displays your name, the name of the shared item, pemissions granted to the recipients, and sign in information, if necessary.
share.standard_message: Add a note to standard message

tooltip.resend: Resend email notification about this share
